answers.answer: HiWelcome to the MedHelp forum!This could be due to anemia, diabetes, hypothyroid states, tuberculosis, overwork, stress and fatigue. If your stomach too feels queasy, there is a chance that you have inflammation of the bowels as seen in IBS, colitis or maybe even gluten or lactose intolerance. Discuss this with your doctor and try and get investigated. Hope this helps. Take care!
Dehydration too could be a cause so drink water and fluids and see.
